name: Parkatch
description:
OBS: The html version is a little buggy, if possible, download the windows version.

It's a short 3D game made for ScoreSpace Jam19. It has a online score/ranking  system made with LootLocker, keybinds, settings menu, level select and more!

Controls*:

WASD for Move

Mouse to Look

Shift to Run

Espace to Jump

C to Crouch/Slide

R for Pause

*You can change it in the menu.
